reviewText: Theres no sexual scenes in this flick.  Its basicaly a couple of dancers stripping down and dancing in front of the camera.  There's some girl/girl grinding action.  Everyone gets fully nude.  Theres lots of full frontal nudity.  Some of the girls are very hot looking, some look like trailer trash witha capitol'T'...  If you like dancing girls stripping and grinding, you'll like this one.  There's a couple vampires biting scenes, but the kool-aide or dyed water that comes out looks real cheesy.

If you liked Volume One, you will really like Volume 2. The models featured in this DVD are just stunning. But there is also the special FX which is much better than most horror movies. Especially the scene when the guy gets a pool que in the eye, it really looks real.  The production values are raised to new heights and the girls are just amazing. I would highly recommend buying this DVD for fans of horror and naked girls. Hail, Hail FEAR GIRLS!

In the second installment of this series, horror and erotica collide during three vignettes of blood soaked suspense, and there's a few worthy stripteases thrown in as well. Some of the comliest women in erotic horror bare all before they brutally kill and drain their victims (of blood) is primarily what's on parade, and that's what elevates the 'Fear Factor' over the first volume. In the first, not all scenarios involved horror, but were much more explicit than the second volume. This time out, the lighting could be better in spots so we viewers could see more as the succubi stripped for our enjoyment. More time was spent developing stronger 'plots', but I was happier with the first volume - I personally thought the women were a bit more attractive and comfortable in front of the camera. This volume seemed a bit forced, IMHO. The Russian twins are attractive but not gorgeous, and didn't put on a great show. Tararyze has too many tatoos for my tastes, but this is a subjective statement, you may love them. The remainder of the ladies are quite fine, and this is good fun to watch, though a bit short - the main feature is only 49 minutes, but there's a few extras to pad things out. I'd recommend the first volume over this one, and also check out 'Satanic Sluts III, Scandalized', before buying this one. Fear not the 'Fear Girls', for there is fun for all...

Show was great. Everything a fella could hope for with the exception of a well lit stage. It was so dark that you really couldn't see anything (if you know what I mean). Butt nekkid, full frontal and you can't see a thing.
